sqlMap.insert: insert into funds_channel (id, points_withdraw_poundage_account_name, points_withdraw_poundage_account_number, fft_points_poundage_account_number, points_withdraw_account_name, points_withdraw_account_number, fft_points_poundage_account_name, fft_allowance_account_number, fft_allowance_account_name, fft_points_account_number, fft_points_account_name, fft_gathering_account_number, fft_gathering_account_name, bank_gathering_account_number, bank_gathering_account_name, currency, channel_type, channel_short_name, channel_full_name, pay_org, funds_channel_no, remark, update_time, create_time, state) values (#id:INT#, #pointsWithdrawPoundageAccountName:VARCHAR#, #pointsWithdrawPoundageAccountNumber:VARCHAR#, #fftPointsPoundageAccountNumber:VARCHAR#, #pointsWithdrawAccountName:VARCHAR#, #pointsWithdrawAccountNumber:VARCHAR#, #fftPointsPoundageAccountName:VARCHAR#, #fftAllowanceAccountNumber:VARCHAR#, #fftAllowanceAccountName:VARCHAR#, #fftPointsAccountNumber:VARCHAR#, #fftPointsAccountName:VARCHAR#, #fftGatheringAccountNumber:VARCHAR#, #fftGatheringAccountName:VARCHAR#, #bankGatheringAccountNumber:VARCHAR#, #bankGatheringAccountName:VARCHAR#, #currency:VARCHAR#, #channelType:VARCHAR#, #channelShortName:VARCHAR#, #channelFullName:VARCHAR#, #payOrg:VARCHAR#, #fundsChannelNo:VARCHAR#, #remark:VARCHAR#, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y-%m-%d|%H:%i:%s"), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y-%m-%d|%H:%i:%s"), #state:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update:
update funds_channel set update_time = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y-%m-%d|%H:%i:%s")
points_withdraw_poundage_account_name = #pointsWithdrawPoundageAccountName:VARCHAR#

fft_points_account_number = #fftPointsAccountNumber:VARCHAR#
fft_points_account_name = #fftPointsAccountName:VARCHAR#
fft_gathering_account_number = #fftGatheringAccountNumber:VARCHAR#
fft_gathering_account_name = #fftGatheringAccountName:VARCHAR#
bank_gathering_account_number = #bankGatheringAccountNumber:VARCHAR#
bank_gathering_account_name = #bankGatheringAccountName:VARCHAR#
currency = #currency:VARCHAR#
channel_type = #channelType:VARCHAR#
channel_short_name = #channelShortName:VARCHAR#
channel_full_name = #channelFullName:VARCHAR#
pay_org = #payOrg:VARCHAR#
funds_channel_no = #fundsChannelNo:VARCHAR#
remark = #remark:VARCHAR#
state = #state:VARCHAR#
where id = #id:INT#
